_schema: Movies & Shows - type: movie | show | documentary | anime, status: watching | completed | want-to-watch

media.title: Jiro Dreams of Sushi
media.thoughts: The pursuit of mastery. Fardin watches this whenever he needs to remember what dedication looks like.

media.title: The Last Dance
media.thoughts: Jordan's relentless drive is both inspiring and terrifying. The price of greatness.

media.title: Stutz
media.thoughts: Phil Stutz's tools for living. The 'Life Force' concept hit different.

media.title: Free Solo
media.thoughts: Alex Honnold climbing El Capitan without ropes. Pure commitment.

media.title: Succession
media.thoughts: A masterclass in power, family dysfunction, and Shakespearean tragedy. The writing is unreal.

media.title: Mr. Robot
media.thoughts: The most technically accurate hacking show ever made. Plus the mental health themes hit hard.

media.title: Fight Club
media.thoughts: About masculinity, consumerism, and identity. Dangerous if misunderstood, profound if you get it.

media.title: Whiplash
media.thoughts: Is greatness worth destroying yourself? The ending still gives chills.

media.title: The Social Network
media.thoughts: Fincher's masterpiece. The loneliness at the top, captured perfectly.

media.title: Cosmos: A Spacetime Odyssey
media.thoughts: Neil deGrasse Tyson making the universe feel personal. Big History vibes.
